      static java.lang.String GENERATE_SUMMARIES
      Enable/disable partial program analysis (summaries) If enabled the type sets are converted to tags and the resulting index can be used to resume analysis later If disabled the maximal type is extracted from the type set and the qualifier sets are removed
      static java.lang.Boolean GENERATE_SUMMARIES_DEFAULT

      Enables/disables inference rule logging to the Atlas log
      static java.lang.Boolean INFERENCE_RULE_LOGGING_DEFAULT 
      static java.lang.String LOAD_SUMMARIES
      Enable/disable importing existing summaries If enabled existing summaries will be applied to the index before any other operations
      static java.lang.Boolean LOAD_SUMMARIES_DEFAULT 
      static java.lang.String RUN_IMMUTABILITY_ANALYSIS
      Enable/disable immutability analysis

      • GENERATE_SUMMARIES

        public static final java.lang.String GENERATE_SUMMARIES
        Enable/disable partial program analysis (summaries) If enabled the type sets are converted to tags and the resulting index can be used to resume analysis later If disabled the maximal type is extracted from the type set and the qualifier sets are removed
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • GENERATE_SUMMARIES_DEFAULT

        public static final java.lang.Boolean GENERATE_SUMMARIES_DEFAULT

      • LOAD_SUMMARIES

        public static final java.lang.String LOAD_SUMMARIES
        Enable/disable importing existing summaries If enabled existing summaries will be applied to the index before any other operations
        See Also:
